# Hi, I'm Brisk4t!

![Fried Components](https://img.shields.io/badge/300%2B-Fried%20Components-white.svg?labelColor=white&color=black&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
![Bugs Created](https://img.shields.io/badge/%3F%3F%3F%2B-Bugs%20Created-white.svg?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=lightseagreen&color=grey&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
![Minor Injuries](https://img.shields.io/badge/50%2B-Minor%20Injuries-white.svg?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=firebrick&color=mintcream&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)






I code, I think and **occasionally** do both at the same time! Usually because I got annoyed at something trivial. I've successfully convinced myself that I enjoy this process and have a healthy relationship with my computer.

As you can tell I'm something of a tinkerer myself, while I do enjoy the coding I also love building hardware projects and just tinkering in general. As I make more things I'll keep this updated.

## What I'm working on right now

### [ToothPaste](https://github.com/Brisk4t/ToothPaste) - Type / Paste Keyboard Data, Mouse Controls and Nefarious Scripts securely over WEB-BLE.
